room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Asylum" by Know Way Out in Petoskey
review: So fun. I’ve done two of the rooms so far. Trying the third on Sunday! The Mad Hatter room is especially awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Asylum" by Know Way Out in Petoskey
review: Went with a group of friends! We had a blast! We did the Mad Hatter room and it was set up so cool! The props were great! Music and ambience was spot on! Can’t wait to go back - had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter's Asylum" by Know Way Out in Petoskey
review: So much fun in the Mad Hatter Room! The best decorated escape room we've been to. The manner in which clues were delivered and the way the room(s) unfolded were spectacular! High recommend!
